tasks.label: Smoke test booking edge cases
args:
set -e
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"sessionId":"t1","selectedOption":"start_booking"}' >/dev/null
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"sessionId":"t1","selectedOption":"next_monday"}' | jq -r '.message' | head -n1
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"sessionId":"t1","selectedOption":"time_14"}' | jq -r '.message' | head -n1
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"sessionId":"t2","selectedOption":"start_booking"}' >/dev/null
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"sessionId":"t2","selectedOption":"specific"}' | jq -r '.requiresTextInput'
curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3001/api/chat -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"sessionId":"t2","query":"next monday at 10:30 AM"}' | jq -r '.message' | sed -n '1p'
